The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are found in an area with a mass amount of bodies all seeming to have died from some unknown force, but had there normal possessions on their bodies and under the circumstances we expect this to be a very straight foward Lovecraftian Lovecraftian Lovecraftian Lovecraftian sand Lovecraft love romance film.

I saw it tonight and fell asleep in the movie.

That is something that I have not done since - I have never fallen asleep at a real movie in a theater..

Ever.
